summary: Set during the final days of the Japanese occupation of Korea, an adventurer and a jazz singer team up to steal a priceless diamond.
cast: Kil-kang Ahn|Lee Bo-young|Hie-bong Jo|Eung-soo Kim|Su-hyeon Kim|Yong-woo Park|Dong-il Sung
keywords: 1940s|buddha statue|year 1945|japanese occupation of korea|world war two
title: Wonseu-eopon-eo-taim
